description: Doshalla, or long shawl, hand-loom woven, made of jamawar, a patterned shawl cloth woven by the yard, and finished with separate woven borders. Design of alternating vertical stripes. The wide one carrying a running floral design in which pinks are the chief blossom, the narrow one a reciprocal floral band. Pale blue ground. Wide end borders with a band of large cones. Black cotton lining. # 8.
title: Doshalla
